title: Run Phase 0 benchmarks and Go/No-Go decision
description: Execute performance benchmarks to validate AMST bandwidth utilization, HDE compression ratio, migration time reduction, and CPU overhead. Make Go/No-Go decision for Phase 1.
design: Run go test -bench=. for bandwidth, compression, migration time, CPU overhead. Document results. Criteria: bandwidth >70%, compression >5x, no breaking changes, CPU <30%.
acceptance_criteria: All benchmark targets met, results documented in docs/DWCP-PHASE0-RESULTS.md, Go/No-Go decision made and documented

title: Create DWCP package structure
description: Create backend/core/network/dwcp/ directory structure with transport/, compression/, prediction/, sync/, partition/, consensus/ subdirectories and initial files.
design: mkdir -p backend/core/network/dwcp/{transport,compression,prediction,sync,partition,consensus}. Create initial files: dwcp_manager.go, config.go, types.go
acceptance_criteria: Directory structure created, initial files present with package declarations

title: Phase 2: Intelligence - PBA + ITP
description: ML-driven bandwidth prediction (PBA with LSTM) and intelligent task partitioning (ITP with Deep RL) implementation.
design: Implement PBA with LSTM models for bandwidth prediction, implement ITP with Deep RL for task partitioning, integrate with ai_engine/, add performance benchmarks.
acceptance_criteria: PBA prediction accuracy ≥85%, ITP improves distributed workload speed by ≥2x, AI models deployed and operational.

title: Phase 3: Synchronization - ASS + ACP
description: Multi-region state synchronization (ASS) and adaptive consensus (ACP) for distributed coordination.
design: Implement ASS for async state synchronization with eventual consistency, enhance ACP with adaptive consensus (Raft/Gossip/Byzantine), deploy multi-region test environment.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-region deployment successful, state staleness <5s, consensus adapts to network conditions, consistency validation passing.

title: Set up production deployment pipeline
description: Create CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment. Frontend is production-ready. Docker Compose configuration exists at docker-compose.production.yml

title: Phase 5: Production Validation
description: End-to-end testing, load testing, chaos engineering, security audit, and production deployment validation.
design: E2E tests (VM migration, workload distribution, multi-region), load tests (1000 concurrent operations), chaos tests (network partition, node failure), security audit, canary deployment.
acceptance_criteria: All E2E tests passing, load tests meet SLA targets, chaos tests demonstrate resilience, security audit passed, production deployment successful with rollback plan validated.

title: DWCP Integration into NovaCron
description: Implement Distributed WAN Communication Protocol across 5 phases to enable internet-scale distributed supercomputing. Expected outcomes: 92% WAN bandwidth utilization, 28x compression ratio, 3.3x faster VM migration, 2-3x distributed workload speed.
design: Integration follows 5-phase roadmap: Phase 0 (PoC - 2 weeks), Phase 1 (Foundation - 4 weeks), Phase 2 (Intelligence - 4 weeks), Phase 3 (Synchronization - 4 weeks), Phase 4 (Optimization - 4 weeks), Phase 5 (Production Validation - 6 weeks). Total timeline: 22 weeks.
acceptance_criteria: All 5 phases completed with validation criteria met: WAN bandwidth ≥85%, compression ≥10x, migration speedup ≥2x, backward compatibility maintained, multi-region deployment successful.

title: Fix backend duplicate type declarations
description:
Multiple types are declared in multiple files causing compilation errors. Need to consolidate:
- NodeState in consensus/raft.go and consensus/membership.go
- NetworkMetrics in network/performance_predictor.go and network/network_manager.go  
- User, AuditLogger, AuditEvent, Role, Permission in security package

title: Create Phase 0 integration tests
description: Create comprehensive integration test suite covering AMST bandwidth utilization, HDE compression ratio, end-to-end VM migration, and backward compatibility.
design: Create integration_test.go with tests for: multi-stream vs single TCP, delta encoding vs full state, E2E migration with DWCP, backward compatibility. Use testify/assert for assertions.
acceptance_criteria: All integration tests passing, test coverage >80%, backward compatibility confirmed

title: Phase 1: Foundation - AMST + HDE Production
description: Production-ready AMST (multi-stream TCP + RDMA) and HDE (delta encoding + compression) implementation with configuration management, monitoring, and staging deployment.
design: Complete AMST with RDMA fallback, complete HDE with adaptive compression, add configuration management, implement monitoring/metrics, deploy to staging.
acceptance_criteria: AMST achieves ≥85% bandwidth utilization, HDE achieves ≥10x compression, all integration tests passing, staging deployment successful.

title: Clean up unused imports and variables
description: Remove unused imports like database/sql in pkg/database/optimized_database.go and fix declared but unused variables

title: Phase 1: DWCP Production Foundation
description: Implement production-ready AMST and HDE with full integration into NovaCron. Deploy monitoring, testing, and staging environment. Use neural-trained hive-mind swarm for coordinated implementation.
design: Neural-aware hive-mind architecture with queen coordinator, specialized worker agents, and cross-agent memory synchronization. Train patterns from Phase 0, deploy production components, integrate with existing services.
acceptance_criteria: Production AMST and HDE deployed, bandwidth utilization >85%, compression ratio >10x, monitoring functional, staging tests passing

title: Phase 0: DWCP Proof-of-Concept
description: Validate DWCP integration with AMST + HDE prototype. Goals: Prove multi-stream TCP works with existing migration service, demonstrate delta encoding reduces bandwidth, confirm no breaking changes.
design: Create DWCP package structure, implement AMST prototype (multi-stream TCP with 16-256 streams), implement HDE prototype (delta encoding + Zstandard compression), integrate with migration service, run benchmarks.
acceptance_criteria: Bandwidth utilization >70%, compression ratio >5x, integration tests passing, benchmark results documented, Go/No-Go decision made.

title: Implement AMST prototype
description: Implement Adaptive Multi-Stream Transport with 16-256 concurrent TCP streams, dynamic stream allocation, and per-stream congestion control.
design: Create transport/multi_stream_tcp.go with MultiStreamTCP struct, NewMultiStreamTCP(), Send(), Receive() methods. Implement stream_manager.go for lifecycle management and packet_pacer.go for software pacing.
acceptance_criteria: AMST achieves >70% bandwidth utilization in benchmarks, supports 16-256 streams, integrates with net.Conn interface

title: finish frontend development on all features and pages
Implement HDE prototype
description: Implement Hierarchical Delta Encoding with baseline state management, delta encoding for VM memory pages, and Zstandard compression.
design: Create compression/delta_encoder.go with DeltaEncoder struct, baseline_manager.go for state tracking, adaptive_compressor.go for compression level selection. Integrate with Zstandard library.
acceptance_criteria: HDE achieves >5x compression ratio in benchmarks, successfully encodes/decodes VM memory pages, adaptive compression working

title: Phase 4: Production Optimization
description: Performance tuning, security hardening, deployment automation, and comprehensive monitoring for production readiness.
design: CPU/memory/network optimization, TLS 1.3 + JWT security hardening, deployment automation scripts, Prometheus/Grafana monitoring, comprehensive alerting.
acceptance_criteria: Performance targets met (CPU <70%, memory <80%, network optimized), security audit passed, automated deployment working, monitoring operational.

title: COMPLETED: Fix backend Go import cycle and dependencies
description:
Successfully resolved critical backend issues:
1. Fixed Prometheus import path in scaling/enterprise_scaler.go
2. Created local AI stub package to replace private repo dependency  
3. Broke import cycle between core/vm and core/federation by creating shared interfaces package
4. All dependencies resolved with go mod tidy

Import cycle completely resolved. All Go dependencies fixed. go.mod and go.sum updated. Shared interfaces package created at backend/core/shared/interfaces.go

title: Add missing struct fields in backend
description:
Several structs are missing fields that are being referenced:
- RaftNode.nodeID
- VMMetric.MemoryPercent, DiskReadBytes, DiskWriteBytes, NetworkRxBytes, NetworkTxBytes
- NetworkMetrics.SourceNode, TargetNode
